title: Growing demand for the new Personal Finance Minor now being offered in UW-Green Bay's Cofrin School of Business - UWGB
content: Growing demand for the new Personal Finance Minor now being offered in UW-Green Bay's Cofrin School of Business  UWGB
description: Students who graduate with a the minor will be able to sit for the CFP Certification Examination by the CFP Board Preston Cherry, assistant professor of Personal Financial Planning and Finance at the University...
